name: The Love Interests get their Own Game
name_original: The Love Interests get their Own Game
description:
♦ Website ♦ Twitter ♦ Discord ♦  Patreon ♦ 

The Love Interests get their Own Game
is a spin-off of I'm a love interest in my childhood friend's reverse harem!!! and takes place after the events of Ending 00. 
It was made for YaoiJam2021 in the span of 2 months with the help of many incredible people.

Join Hong Yang and Ao on their 'first date' to the zoo. 
Explore the boys' relationship as they try to adjust from being neighbours, to friends, to lovers.
Learn some fun animal facts along the way.

Game Features:
- Approx 5,500 words (roughly 15 minutes play through)
- One ending
- Australian setting

There are currently no CGs included in the game, but they will be added into the 1.1 build at a later date.

The game will normally be priced at $2.00 USD, but will be available for free upon launch until September 9th where it goes back to full price. From September 9th-23rd the main game I'm a love interest in my childhood friend's reverse harem!!! will be on sale.

Credits:
Project Lead - Red Chan
Editor - Alison 'Drazillion' Huang 
Ending Credits Illustrator - Lois Vehof
Theme Song Composer - Starling

Additional Resources:
